price: 9. And the fifth (testimony) should be that the Wrath of Allâh be upon her if he (her husband) speaks the truth.
arabic: وَٱلۡخَٰمِسَةَ أَنَّ غَضَبَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡهَآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ
